documentation.title: Declare Statement
documentation.standard: Declare statement must be correctly formatted.

code.title: Valid: No space after the declare statement.
Invalid: One or more spaces after the declare statement.
Valid: No space before and after the declare directive.
Invalid: One or more spaces before or after the declare directive.
Valid: No space before and after the declare directive value.
Invalid: One or more spaces before or after the declare directive value.
Valid: No space after the semicolon.
Invalid: One or more spaces after the semicolon.
Valid: One space after closing parenthesis and opening curly bracket in a declare statement.
Invalid: More spaces after closing parenthesis and opening curly bracket in a declare statement.
Valid: The directive of a declare statement is written in lowercase letters.
Invalid: The directive of a declare statement is written in mixed case letters (or all upper case letters).
Valid: There is no code after opening curly bracket.
Invalid: There is code after opening curly bracket.
Valid: The closing curly bracket of a declare statement is on a new line and aligned with the declare keyword.
Invalid: The closing curly bracket of a declare statement is not on a new line.
